<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List organization teams"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/admin/teams"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of teams in your organization. Append `?search=<teamname>` to return results for a given `<teamname>`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"max","in":"query","description":"Pagination max results","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"offset","in":"query","description":"Pagination offset","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},{"name":"search","in":"query","description":"Filter search parameter","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"attributes","in":"query","schema":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"}}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalSize":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"teams":{"type":"array","items":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"},"teamId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"avatarUrl":{"type":"string"},"membersCount":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"TeamDbDto"},{"type":"object","properties":{"organizationId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"organizationName":{"type":"string"},"workspacesCount":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}],"title":"EnrichedTeamDbDto"}}},"title":"EnrichedListTeamsResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
